All Classes

Class
Description
DrawingSurface
This class represents the surface on which the screens and interactive sprites will be drawn.
Enemy
This class extends Sprite and represents an enemy which will attack the player until specific circumstances.
EscapeScreen
This class represents the screen displayed that presents a menu of options whne the user presses the esc and is currently on the GameScreen
FirstLevel
 
GameScreen
This class represents a Game Screen, which is the screen that the interactive game appears on
InvisCloak
This class extends Sprite and represents a stationary object which the player can pick up to turn invisible.
Main
This class implements the DrawingSurface to display the Screens
Obstacle
This class represents an non-Enemy obstacles in the game.
Player
This class represent the player will the user will controll.
Screen
This class represents a screen in the overall game.
ScreenSwitcher
Any class that implements this interface has the ability to swtich the appearance of the drawing panel to a different screen.
Sprite
This class represents the objects which will have interactions while the game is running.
StartingScreen
This class represents the starting screen, which is the first screen that prompts the user to play the game.
